name: Entryway DM  (For Doom 2)
description: This is a fairly large wad intended to take advan- tage of Doom Legacy's new capabilities (i.e. jump- ing and mouse look). It will be the first of a series of levels made specifically for Legacy. The series will be based on the names of the actual Doom 2 levels (i.e. "Entryway" or "The Focus") but will be original levels that are DM specific.
